description: Sometimes all you want is a quick and easy dinner. Make this tasty meatball sub when you’re short on time – it's done and dusted in 15 minutes.
keywords: Sandwich,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Kale,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy
name: Beef & Veg Meatball Subs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g beef meatballs with carrot, celery, tomato & caramelised red onion

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs extra virgin olive oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook meatballs, turning, for 8 minutes or until browned and cooked through.
Meanwhile, preheat oven grill on high. Halve rolls lengthways, ensuring not to cut all the way through. Grill rolls, cut-sides up, for 2 minutes or until toasted.
Meanwhile, prepare kaleslaw according to packet instructions.
Place a little kaleslaw mixture on roll bases. Top with meatballs and drizzle with sauce. Serve with remaining kaleslaw.
